source_objects.description: Learn about new religions, understand your spirituality, and much more.
source_objects.title: Religion & Spirituality

items.title: Understanding Revelation

visible_instructors.name: Annalise
visible_instructors.title: Annalise van Rensburg
visible_instructors.job_title: LTH Diploma in Theology  1980 Berea Theological Seminary SA

items.headline: In depth study of the book of revelations
objectives_summary: You will have knowledge and understanding of the Word.
You will get the greater picture of the Word

items.title: Buddhism for Beginners
items.headline: Understanding the History, Teachings, and Application of the Dharma
objectives_summary: Learn about the basic history of the Buddha and Buddhism
Understand the basic principles and teachings known as dharma
Investigate different schools and traditions of Buddhism

items.title: Tikkun - Soul rectification according to the Kabbalah
items.headline: Gain a broader perspective on your life according to spiritual and Kabbalah principles.
objectives_summary: Spiritual healing and development and knowledge of Kabbalah through the topic of soul rectification

items.title: Divine Healing School for Believers
items.headline: 7 Keys to Heal the Sick and Afflicted
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, the student will be awakened to the reality of divine healing, will understand how some people are healed by God while others are not, and how Jesus has authorized us to carry on His healing ministry.
And finally, the student will have learned how to pray more effectively for the people in their lives.

items.title: Mindfulness Practitioner Certificate Course

visible_instructors.title: Fabulous Body
visible_instructors.job_title: Educating & Empowering the World through Courses & Articles
visible_instructors.name: Fabulous

items.headline: Learn how to Use Mindfulness to Find Lasting Peace & Happiness in Your Life
objectives_summary: Learn about the Two Models of Mindfulness: The 2500-Year Old Historical Model and The 25-Year Old Contemporary Model
Learn techniques and strategies to get rid of The Five Hindrances like doubt, worry, sloth, torpor, restlessness etc
-Develop mental qualities such as concentration of the mind, tranquillity, equanimity etc.

items.title: Yoga philosophy - Complete yoga teacher knowledge
items.headline: Vedic philosophy- find happiness and purpose in Yoga
objectives_summary: Students will gain the complete knowledge of vedic philosophy that our yoga teachers get in our ashram in india
You will learn everything about what yoga is, what the vedas are, mythology, and how to use this knowledge to find peace, a purpose and happiness in your daily life
Learn about the 4 stages of life according to nature

items.title: Minister's Crash Course
items.headline: A Guide to Successful Gospel Ministry
objectives_summary: Gain a precise and Biblical perspective of real gospel ministry that pleases God, understand every Minister's true assignment, and learn the spiritual and practical secrets for successful Christian ministry and Church leadership

items.title: Selections from the Psalms: Part One
items.headline: The prayer book of the Bible
objectives_summary: Discover how to incorporate the Psalms into your own prayers or devotional life.
Learn about the Psalms as the prayer book of the Bible and the early church.
Explore how the New Testament writers make use of key themes in the Psalms.

items.title: Nordic Mythology and the Vikings.
items.headline: Live and Die without Fear and Shame
objectives_summary: Nordic Mythology and the VIking Way. How to Live Without Fear and Shame
History of Nordic Mythology and the Vikings

items.title: Western Philosophy: From Renaissance to Enlightenment
items.headline: Learn the Philosophy of the West's Greatest Thinkers
objectives_summary: Summarize the main ideas of history's greatest Western thinkers
Apply life lessons of history's greatest Western thinkers
Analyze religious and philosophical ideologies

items.title: Master 12 Step Recovery - this program has helped millions!
items.headline: Transform your mind and life with this proven program & easy-to-use video series and fill-in-the-blanks workbook.
objectives_summary: If you have a family member or members who are alcoholics or addicts you will learn exactly what they need do to achieve and maintain long term sobriety i.e. stay clean. Also (just as important) if you choose to work these 12 Steps you too can have a spiritual experience or spiritual awakening and learn how to grow it. Like millions of others - you too can learn to live a spiritual life
Learn how to live alcohol and drug free
Find the same lasting peace-of-mind millions have found

items.title: What Happens to you After you Die?
items.headline: An introduction to the Spirit World as was channelled from the other side
objectives_summary: Understand what happens to your soul after you die- the transitioning from a Human to a Spirit
Understand what your life's purpose is
Stop fearing Death

items.title: Meditation & Consciousness Teacher/Practitioner - Accredited

visible_instructors.title: Mohmood Valimohamed
visible_instructors.job_title: Director of Center For Inner Awakening
visible_instructors.name: Mohmood

items.headline: The Art of Witnessing - Using Meditation, Consciousness, Energy Healing & Spirituality, Accredited Certification Program
objectives_summary: Meditation and Consciousness Coach/Practitioner Certification Program
Learn practical techniques that can be applied in today's fast paced society
Learn to live consciously in the present moment

items.title: 7 Rules of Bible Interpretation EVERY Christian Should Know

visible_instructors.name: Gustavo
visible_instructors.job_title: New Testament Professor at the Biblical Seminary of Colombia
visible_instructors.title: Gustavo Karakey

items.headline: Draw nearer to God with these advanced Bible study techniques. For small group leaders and members!
objectives_summary: Understand any passage of the Bible and how to apply it to your daily life
Be better prepared to answer questions about the Bible
Be better prepared to listen to sermons or to engage with literature / articles that surround the Bible

items.title: Become a Spiritual Medium
items.headline: Discover your mediumship gifts & become a medium.
objectives_summary: Be able to confidently connect with Spirit.
Learn how to connect to Spirit with a variety of tools.
Connect to Spirit Guides and Masters.

items.title: A Fundamental Course on Indian Vedic Astrology (Jyotish)
items.headline: Learn Vedic Astrology for Astrologers, Planetary & Sign Characteristics, Horoscope Analysis applying Jyotish concepts.
objectives_summary: Students will learn Fundamentals of Indian Vedic Astrology with step by step rules to follow. This will enhance their predictive accuracy.
Students will learn about technical terminologies of Vedic Astrology and will be able to analyze any horoscope. Students will also get a free eBook.
Students will learn about astral remedies that help as preventive measures.
